tasks.task: Discuss thoughts on sustainability in agriculture.
subtasks: Explain the role of chemical fertilizers in traditional agriculture.
Describe transition to natural fertilizers like manure and compost.
Mention use of compost for organic farming.
Address balancing chemical use with sustainability.
